card.description: Zoey asked everyone in her English class to complete the survey and they all did!

context.potentialUses: The questions can help recommend a club to join based on your interests and personality.
context.potentialMisuses: The data only came from people in our school and community - be careful about using it in different schools.

activity.description: Which of these activities do you like the most?

personality.description: How do you like to spend your time?

element.description: Which of these elements is your favorite?

make build.description: How do you feel about the following statement: "I like to make and build things with my hands"

meet people.description: How do you feel about the following statement: "I like to learn new things and meet new people"

club.description: What is a club you would want to join or are already a part of?
